text: "Love Potion No. 9" is a 1959 song by The Clovers and went to number 23 in the United States and was covered by The Searchers and The Coasters. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 4 in New Zealand and number 6 in Canada. title: Love Potion No. 9 (song)
